tweakerplus.config.immediatelyRespawn.co: Respawn immediately after death without showing the death screen
tweakerplus.config.playerListScale.comme: Scale the player list hud with given factor
tweakerplus.config.leftAlignTitleGloball: Apply the left aligned title to all config GUIs using malilib
tweakerplus.config.xmapNoDeathWaypointFo: Stop creating death waypoints for creative players
tweakerplus.config.bundleOriginInSchemat:
Bundle the origin in the schematic when saving it
When loading the schematic, if the origin info is present in the file, the placement will be moved to its origin
(Using 'Create placement' button after loading will still place the placement at the player)
The origin info will be appended at the right panel of the schematic browser
tweakerplus.config.hideDisabledOptions.c: Hide options which are disabled due to mod relations unsatisfied in the config GUI
tweakerplus.config.openTweakerPlusConfig: Open the config GUI of TweakerPlus
Debug mode of TweakerPlus
When enabled, debug parameter options and options not supported by the current Minecraft version will be displayed
and debugging related functions will be enabled
tweakerplus.config.tweakerPlusDebugInt.c: A integer parameter for TweakerPlus debugging
tweakerplus.config.tweakerPlusDebugDoubl: A double parameter for TweakerPlus debugging
tweakerplus.gui.title: TweakerPlus v%1$s Config GUI
tweakerplus.gui.trigger_button.hover:
Click to trigger %1$s once
§7§oThis will simulate hotkey pressed and released in order§r
tweakerplus.gui.label.schematic_load.hov: If checked, if origin info is present in the schematic, the placement will be moved to its origin instead of the player
